headline.main: NAZIS CLAIM TOWN ON CAUCASUS LINE; Announce Capture of Salsk -Railroad Reported Crossed Along a Broad Front DON BEND FIGHT VIOLENT Germans Say They Destroyed 48 Tanks -- Russian Attacks at Rzhev Termed Futile

lead_paragraph: German Army forces have captured the Russian railway junction town of Salsk, about 100 miles southeast of Rostov, and have crossed the Stalingrad-Krasnodar railway on a broad front "in pursuing the beaten enemy in the east," the German High Command announced yesterday, according to Berlin broadcasts recorded by The Associated Press.
abstract: Gers claim 48 USSR tanks destroyed, that area
